isFocusOwner(target : prime.gui.events.UserEventTarget) : Bool

inherited from prime.gui.traits.IInteractive
Method returns true if the given target (which has focus) makes the IInteractive object the focus owner. This is usefull when a Label with a textfield loses its focus to the textfield, but is still the focus-owner.
